remarks: Lemma for transfinite recursion.  Assuming ~ ax-rep , ` dom recs e. _V <-> recs e. _V ` , so since ` dom recs ` is an ordinal, it must be equal to ` On ` .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.)
statement:
tfrlem.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlem14 $p |- dom recs ( F ) = On $.
$d F f x y $.
$d f x y $.
$d f x y $.
